description: listen, save songs in the format .ogg... TOP

This app is fantastic - does what it says, and gets out of the way of the music. Local stations and the mini player are a nice touch, although one thing I'd love to see is a pause button in conjunction with the stop button.

This was a great program and then today 24 august 2022 it updated to a new version and now if you try to save more than 2 songs it crashes...if you do not try to save a song it seems to work fine.

Maybe should have brought out a beta copy first leaving the old one to be reloaded if there were issues with the new version
summary: Was great until it was updated August 2022

description: Really great piece of software, big thanks.
If you want to listen to Internet radio and you're a Gnome user, you should be using Shortwave.
Just does what it should, 5 stars!
summary: Simple and easy to tuse radio app

description: Ok, works well. Listening to Hip-Hop and Regae. Euro-trance dance.
Really great app. Listening Bollywood 90s and Retro.
Gnome now has the best internet radio app.

Enabling dark theme failed to enable a dark theme. Unable to detect song metadata (saying there wasn't any) when the metadata was available and used by VLC. Crashed when trying to open Soma.fm Groove Salad station. Uninstalled.

This app has really nice modern design and does exactly what it supposed to do - allows one to find preferred radio stations and play them. Additional features like playing song detection and play to external device are great, although I did not tested them.
It would be great GNOME would have more such simple quality apps
summary: Great modern app for GNOME environment

description: This looks like a very nice app, however, I was not able to add any stations to the Library. Hope the developer (who has done a very fine job) is able to sort this out.
It works fine, I could fine all the radios I use to listen to.

The interface is superb. It works without issues, it's integrated with the os (you can use the media controls on your keyboard or in your desktop environment), it recognizes the song being played (where possible) and it let's you record the songs you are listening.
This is powered by a public database of radios all around the world, and i can easily find local stations in my hometown.
summary: The best radio program available for linux

description: I love this Radio-App. The App is very simple & beautiful, supports a lot of stations and has a few nice features (like downloading the last played tracks). Very good piece of software.

Its simple, intuitive no clutter and does what you expect it to do.
There are a huge selection of radio stations and podcasts
summary: I love this program. I totally recommend it big time

description: That's my favorite internet radio app.

When I first read that the developer of Gradio was deprecating it in the shadow of a new radio app written from scratch in Rust, I was bummed out. Today I am happy to say that not only is shortwave better with more features but is also much fast at loading your library. The song capuring feature was an unexpected bonus and works perfectly. The only gripe I have with Shortwave in it's early access stage, is that it cannot export stations at all. I really hope the developer adds this functionality ASAP.
summary: From Gradio to Shortwave: The best Radio App on Linux

description: Great app! Several stations and a neat interface!
love it! Thank you!
Can't evaluate it if you can't install it. Looked like a good app though.

Failed to open initially. Then installed through flathub and ran the command to open and discovered the icon theme 'flat-remix-green-dark' would not make an icon for the app. Changed to 'gnome-colors' icons and it opens.
Search should be embeded in discover. simply start typing should search for station. Anyway, very good app. it does what it says.

It's the cleanest one I could find, very well designed.
Also never had a crash or malfunction.

I love to listen chillout music while doing some relaxed work on the evening. The interface is great and clear and the apps is lightweight compared to other thanks also to the technology stack it uses. 

One of the best native linux app out there.
Excellent! Very useful and a large selection of radios to choose from
Can't evaluate what won't install!
This app is great, way beyond my expectations. All the stations I looked for were here, fast start, fast search. Looks good too.
summary: Ubuntu 20.10. Great, incredible number of stations, very fast

description: Works fine, and that's what matters.

We need a Favorites section (preferably with custom playlists) with the ability to categorize stations to our playlists - and we need an export function in the app to be able to create backups of our selections, playlists, and possibly any other relevant settings.

The starting page to search for stations or import is good for the first or second time, but after that I want the app to open up my last search, and play my previously selected station. With Favorites and playlists, I would prefert to jump immediately to my playlists and have the music up and running as I had it before closing the app.
summary: Nicely done, needs some refinement and features to really shine

description: Great app! Install it now!

This is by far the best application where I can listen to radio across Australia. I am from Western Australia so Triple J (WA) is not offered by or can't be located in any other applications. Good job, Felix.
I found my favorite Radio Stream only in this App. Its a 10 Stars App
summary: Just an great App to listen to Radio Stations

description: simple, but nice. Does what i needs to do
Well designed and easy to use. Simply the best internet radio player that I have ever used.
Everything feels so smooth! The responsive design is stunning.
good program thats really looks good
Absolutely nice App. Not to many buttons or options, just all what you need. Best radio app i ever found.
summary: Nice Radio app in Gnome Style

description:
This app changed my Pinephone's "daily driver usability" score (made a video on this recently)!

25,500 stations on your Linux phone!? What more can you ask for?
Excellent Radio App with International and National channels Awesome..

Easy to use to very good selection of channels. The best of all, it did work on my KDE Neon 5.22 I tried several other apps that was just buggy or not worked at all. This app is great, nothing to complain about if you are looking for internet radio player.
summary: Works on KDE, good selection of chanells

description:
Love both the usability/UI and the great selection of radio stations, great app! 

BTW, found out that listening to a new station often exposes me to new artists I would otherwise never got to know.
It's a pretty good app, except it can't play AAC tunes. Probably isn't linked against the required flatpak runtimes.
Works pretty good, what else can I say?
I use it in Endless OS and it runs really slow.
I use it daily. Helps me to find stuff to listen.
Great app with wide range of stations from all over the world and all music styles
I use it every day, strongly recommended!
I appreciate the GUI but it's slow loading stations, doesn't filter by name, slow loading songs. better to search manually through internet and use VLC or event better Rythmbox

Does it play Internet radio stations?
Yes!
Does it allow me to add my own stations?
Yes it does!
Does it display song details while they play?
Yes it does! (if the station supports it)
Does it wash your car on Saturday mornings?
No, it does not!
I use this App on Fedora 35 and it works great! This App is a must have!!
This is a very nice well designed web radio client. I use it every day.
you need to search stations each time you start app...cant add station to kinda favorites...no such option

Great app, I love the fact it uses Radio Browser for its index and has such a nice UX introducing you to that as a third party service. The mini player is also really slick!

Was not prepared for the auto-ripping functionality. What a killer feature.
The GNOME 40 runtime is no longer supported as of March 21, 2022. Please ask your application developer to migrate to a supported platform.

There is some missing icons in the app, and the "No songs detected" area seems to have some visual artifacts.
Other than that though, it works perfectly!
summary: Works, though there is some visual issues

description:
SomaFM is my favorite music project, you can listen to any of it's stations using this app.
Absolutely recommend!
summary: Listen to radio with this app, better than Spotify

description: বাংলাদেশি সব পাবেন

Although description says desktop only, the UI completely usable on pinephone pmos/phosh. No messing around with scaling. Track info shows on lock screen. Doesn't automatically pause for incoming calls...

Works great on Manjaro Plasma mobile.
Thanks for great app.
Thank you gnome team
The mini player is great.

Nice player and many stations across the world. get your music from anywhere.
However, why does it not have a minimise button? If you are using a smaller device this thing is all over the screen
Also, you will notice that your favourite station has several copies. Some with an official badge and many without, all voted on separately?
I can recommend it for its ease of use, legend giving the name of the track you are listening to and is pretty intuitive. Enjoy.
Does everything as expected, very fast with smooth transitions.
Jetzt ist das Ruckeln vom Sendern entlich geschichte. danke für das update

Installiert,aber beim Start kommt nur der Snap Store.
Das war's.Weg damit.....
minimalistisch aber gut
intuitiv zu benutzen und sehr zuverlässig
summary: GUI ist eine große Verbesserung zu gradio

description: Sogar mit Aufnahme Funktion
kein schnickschnag, keine Schnörkel, einfach nur ein Radioplayer für Streams, Stream raussuchen, starten und laufen lassen , so muss es sein.
Habe einige Vertreter dieser Gattung angeschaut, und das hier blieb installiert - klare, einfache GUI, Alle gewünschten Stationen sofort gefunden. Keine Fragen offen bezüglich bedienung.
summary: Super Auswahl, Klare GUI, Funktion ohne SchnickSchnack

description:
Radiosender werden nach Neustart der App teilweise doppelt in der Bibliothek angezeigt und wenn man auf eines der Duplikate klickt beendet sich Shortwave selbst.

Automatisches Speichern der Titel kann nicht deaktiviert werden.
Alle Titel werden während des Abspielens automatisch unter ~/var/app/de.haeckerfelix.Shortwave/cache/tmp gespeichert.
Funktioniert besser als das Radio bei Nextlcoud
sound is choppy

Die App führt sich auf wie wie ein Microsoft-Vormund und nervt damit dauerhaft: Sie löscht eigenmächtig und ohne zu fragen nicht mehr funktionierende Sender aus der gespeicherten Stationsliste. So muss man jedes mal suchen,welche Sender das wohl waren, bevor man sich auf die Suche nach einem funktionierenden Ersatz machen kann.
Perfekte Integration in den Gnome Desktop
Perfekt um seine Lieblingssender zu hören.
Besonders nette Überraschung war der Vintage-Mini-Player :-)
It's amazing download the song just with a click
all i need to listen and to record my favorites songs
La aplicación esta muy bien diseñada, no existiendo ni faltando funcionalidades. Todo al detalle
summary: Excelente funcionalidad y diseño al detalle

description: Extensa base de datos de radios. Al menos las que he probado yo funcionan correctamente.
No me funcionó bien y para desinstalar fue todo un problema, y en la ruta apareció la palabra hacker.
funciona bién en fedora 34, la recomiendo
Fue instalar, buscar radio, reproducir. Funciona muy bien, es muy sencilla.
Fácil ,rápida y hace lo que promete.

Reproductor de radios diseñado para Gnome, minimalista y fácil usar. El modo mini reproductor es un detalle genial.
Versión Flathub (Flatpak) es la oficial, siempre actualizada y funciona perfecto.

Utilisateur intensif de Ryhthm'box, je comptais changer pour permettre de changer plus facilement de station grace à l'interface de celle-ci (v3.0.0). Hélas, je ne peux pas vraiment m'en servir parce que je subis régulièrement des interruptions de flux audio sur diverses radios, alors que cela n'arrive pas avec d'autres logiciels (et les mêmes URL de streams). OS essayés : Xubuntu et Ubuntu 20.04 et 22.04
ne fonctionne plus depuis passage à F34 et pipewire.
Le fais qu'il n'y es pas de favoris ou de liste utilisateurs, ou juste un moyen simple de retrouver ses radios, et d'une débilité sans nom.
summary: Fais le taff, pas plus, n'aime pas l’utilisateur il semble

description:
Gnome essaie de présenter des applications trop simples, mais au final c'est trop compliqué , je ne peux pas ajouter de nouvelles sources de radio, et pourtant jai cherché mais il manque un bon manuel.
Les applications gnome sont pour la plupart inutilisables au détriment de la simplicité.
summary: voulant faire simple, ca devient compliqué

description:
Superbe application de gestion de radio, je ne comprends pas les avis précédents, elle est très simple d'utilisation 

Pour ce qui est dans l'ajout de station il est bien précisé que cela n'est plus possible à cause d'abus, ils utilisent l'API "Radio-Browser"
L'application ne démarre plus!

Супер приложение! Всё лаконично, не перегружено по интерфейсу, единственное чего не хватает это своего аккаунта, чтоб станции в библиотеке оставались и не приходилось всё по новой искать при переустановках
Все работает. рекомендую
Очень классное приложение!Радиоканалы со всего мира!Отличная музыка в хорошем качестве!Рада ,что нашла эту программу .Можно сжать окно ,сидеть за компом и слушать!Помех нет,звук стерео.Советую все!

Не могу вспомнить аналогов по функционалу.
Гигантский список радиостанций на разных языках.
Приложение ведёт список прослушанных композиций и по запросу записывает избранный трек в папку, отдельным файлом.
Однозначно рекомендую!
Оличное приложение, теперь еще и поддерживает темные темы KDE.
Станций много, интерфейс в стиле системы.
лучшее радио в убунту
стабильно работает. Звук качественный. Можно записывать трек.

Здравствуйте, Товарищи!
Хочется отметить то, что это лучшее приложение для прослушивания интернет-радио! Автор молодец! Спасибо за приятные эмоции!
Ничего лишнего, то, что искал )))
